name: Tecmo Bowl™
description: Based on the classic arcade game, Tecmo Bowl™ puts you in tense American Football matches as you take control of one of 12 teams and try to take them all the way to the top! Go head-to-head with a human opponent, or against the computer in action or coaching modes. Plan your plays like a pro, and then make your mark on the field by controlling every pass, block, run, and tackle. This is the US version of the game.
